title: Does any one have vision?
content:
Can any help me ID the this little number

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [All u need.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20070311000217/http:/typophile.com/files/All%20u%20need.png) | 11.01 KB |
author: simplysteve

comments.content:
[Friz Quadrata](http://web.archive.org/web/20070311000217/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=ADT0005333).

[OT] Just realized that veer is the new sponsor of typophile …
Cheers for the ID, their logo looks very similar to Krop!!!
just don’t plant flashing signs around stirring up panic.

Veer’s ID is a custom script, and a lovely one at that. Krop’s logo is set in a slightly modified [Freehand 575](http://web.archive.org/web/20070311000217/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=BT.122496.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Krop&sampleSize=96).
